languages.text: [Вздохнуть] "К сожалению, ты прав. Я не могу позволить себе крутить с тобой роман. Это будет нечестно".
[Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."

languages.text: [Seufzen] "Ihr habt leider recht. Ich kann mir eine Affäre mit Euch nicht leisten. Das wäre nicht fair."
languages.original_text: [Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."

traits.locale_text: [Seufzen] "Ihr habt leider recht. Ich kann mir eine Affäre mit Euch nicht leisten. Das wäre nicht fair."

languages.text: [Soupirer] « Malheureusement, vous avez raison. Je ne peux pas me permettre d'entretenir une liaison avec vous. Ce serait injuste. »
languages.original_text: [Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."

traits.locale_text: [Soupirer] « Malheureusement, vous avez raison. Je ne peux pas me permettre d'entretenir une liaison avec vous. Ce serait injuste. »

languages.text: [ため息をつく]「残念だが、君の言うとおりだ。君と関係を持つ余裕はない。不公平だからな」
languages.original_text: [Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."

traits.locale_text: [ため息をつく]「残念だが、君の言うとおりだ。君と関係を持つ余裕はない。不公平だからな」

languages.text: [Suspirar] «Lamentablemente, está en lo cierto. No puedo permitirme una relación con usted. No sería justo».
languages.original_text: [Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."

traits.locale_text: [Suspirar] «Lamentablemente, está en lo cierto. No puedo permitirme una relación con usted. No sería justo».

languages.text: [叹气]“很遗憾，你说得没错。我不能强迫你与我保持这种关系，这很不公平。”
languages.original_text: [Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."

traits.locale_text: [叹气]“很遗憾，你说得没错。我不能强迫你与我保持这种关系，这很不公平。”

languages.text: [İç çek] "Maalesef haklısın. Seninle sevgili olamayız. Doğru olmaz yani."
languages.original_text: [Sigh] "Unfortunately, you're right. I can't afford to have an affair with you. It wouldn't be fair."
